content:
Mi pare strano, se installi la versione in lingua italiana di Thunderbird le date sono nel formato standard gg/mm/aaaa

Comunque in questa guida viene spiegato come personalizzare questo parametro -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/personalizzare-formati-data-ora-thunderbird
creator: @next

content: The issue you described may be related to the following bug report: macOS Tahoe - Focus Issues https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1989837

content: I suggest you use Thunderbird filters rather than conventional copy or drag and drop.
creator: wsmwk

content: Thanks Wayne, please could explain how to do this? I would like to move all the emails from each year into a folder named after that year, so for instance, I have created a local folder called "2020" and I only want the inbox messages from that year to be copied to that local folder, and then copied from that local folder into the new IMAP folder with the same name for the new email address.
creator: dawson.thirteen

content:
The following steps might be helpful:

Method 1: (On menu bar) "Tools" > "Message Filters"

Method 2: Click the three-horizontal-bar icon on the top right corner. > "Tools" > "Message Filters"

Please see the attached images.

---

The following link might be helpful: Organize your messages with filters https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/organize-your-messages-using-filters
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Thank you for your assistance! Worked perfectly.
creator: miguel.hellstrom

content: In Thunderbird-gegevens naar een nieuwe computer verplaatsen leest u hoe u deze gegevens (die zich in een profiel bevinden) kunt exporteren en daarna weer importeren.
creator: markh2

content:
Do you mean that you do not remember your Primary Password? If so, the following link might be helpful: Protect your Thunderbird passwords with a Primary Password https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/protect-your-thunderbird-passwords-primary-password

Please see the "Reset your Primary Password if you have forgotten it" section in the link above.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Lees Kan geen berichten verzenden voor hints en tips hieromtrent. Waarschijnlijk dient u de serverinstellingen te controleren.
creator: markh2

content:
The image you uploaded shows that you are using Account Hub. However, there are some issues with Account Hub. I suggest you disable Account Hub and then try adding a new email account again.

The following steps should disable Account Hub: "Seetings" > "General" > "Account hub" section > Untick "Create accounts in the new Account Hub".

Please see the attached image.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content:

Regards, Frank

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next
